text: There's no such thing as overdressed when you're Kris Jenner. And on Thursday, the 63 - year - old momager put on her best threads — a Versace ensemble worth $ 8, 000 — for Thanksgiving dinner in Palm Springs.'Wow, you're pretty decked for Thanksgiving dinner,'daughter Kim Kardashian said on Instagram as Kris modeled her luxurious fit with a glass of rose in hand.
